english.segment1: Hey little sister. Why do you cry?. Your holding your head so low. May I ask you Why?. Don't you know that He loves you. Don't you know that he cares. He will never leave you. No. Never leave you there
english.segment2: You are perfect. You are perfectly. Perfectly Done
english.segment3: Hey Little Brother. Oh, I know life has been rough. but I believe in you. cause in God you are tough. you must stand tall. and leave it all. Never let this world. take away your soul
english.segment4: Cause, You are perfect. You are perfectly. Perfectly Done
english.segment5: I believe. that you are perfectly. wonderfully made. in your mother's womb. and I believe. that My God don't make junk. That's why I believe. that your perfectly
